ygData.subject: Re: shadowmen?
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL D@MN I wish I had got this post last night, I went and found the Shadowmen in Soth Karana in the SW corner and my L28 Shaman an L29 Mage and L36 warrior
ygData.messageBody:
LOL D@MN I wish I had got this post last night, I went and found the Shadowmen in Soth Karana in the SW corner and my L28 Shaman an L29 Mage and L36 warrior fought the 4 shadowmen and their pets, and they coned blue and green to all of us and it was a TPK!!! (total party kill) we got slaughtered!! never even killed one of them!

grrrrrr (PS I have a necro and Shaman) :-)

----- Original Message -----
From: Mark Muller
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, October 25, 1999 2:25 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] shadowmen?


Where in the Forest are the Shadowmen? what lvl are they? Can an L28 and a
L25 take the 4 together?
Can we pull one at a time? Thanks

When you zone in from EC, head northwest, the /loc I *think* is
around -1600,500 or thereabouts. They're down in a bit of a valley by a
monolith structure. I highly doubt that a L28 and L25 could clear that
spawn...I was soloing it for a while, basically target the highest /con send
my pet and dot the heck out of him...wait for him to die then gate,
hopefully before the other 3 finish the pet and come after me. I was
successful twice, died once, called for help :) With a L35 nec, L35 warrior
and L35 rogue, we cleared the spawn and all had about 2 bubbles of health
remaining. These guys are *tough* and way undercon'd Best to get a full
group, with at least one primary healer, preferably 2, shaman buffs are nice
too. :)
